channel.title: Brad Butt
channel.description: Recent news about Brad Butt, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Wishing the @ssshufflepc a great weekend! Chuck Jackson's vision will celebrate 15th anniversary this year. Have fun everyone!

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Attended the weekly lunch with Meadowvale #Rotary today. We talked membership. New members always welcome. Let us know.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Went to Credit Valley Hospital today to visit Iole Pasquale, a Streetsville resident, to express best wishes from our community.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Just registered to participate in the @myelomamarch905 on September 22nd in beautiful Lake Aquitaine Park!

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Positive job numbers released today for #Canada. Moving in the right direction but more to do. Our focus remains the economy and jobs.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Gerry Kaplan on @PnPCBC. "Spend your way out." How did that work when you were NDP Bob Rae's chief advisor in Ontario?

item.title: Mentioned by Mississauga
item.description:
MP holds town hall meeting on crime and safety
MISSISSAUGA â€” Mississauga-Streetsville MP Brad Butt will host a town hall meeting on crime and safety at Meadowvale Community Centre next Tuesday night. The meeting will cover back to school and internet safety tips for children, Neighbourhood Watch ...

item.title: Mentioned by DigitalJournal.com (press release)
item.description:
REMINDER/Media Advisory: Government of Canada to Support an Innovative ...
MISSISSAUGA, ONTARIO--(Marketwired - June 21, 2013) - Brad Butt, Member of Parliament for Mississauga-Streetsville, on behalf of the Honourable Gary Goodyear, Minister of State for the Federal Economic Development Agency for Southern Ontario (FedDev Ontario), will announce funding to support an innovative medical device in Mississauga. MP Butt will participate in a photo opportunity and will be available to answer questions from the media following the event. Please note that all details are subject to ...

item.title: Mentioned by DigitalJournal.com (press release)
item.description:
Government of Canada Supports Medical Innovation in Mississauga
MISSISSAUGA, ONTARIO--(Marketwired - June 21, 2013) - Brad Butt, Member of Parliament for Mississauga-Streetsville, on behalf of the Honourable Gary Goodyear, Minister of State for the Federal Economic Development Agency for Southern Ontario (FedDev Ontario), announced today an investment in Mississauga's MyndTec ... "Through Canada's Economic Action Plan 2013, our Government continues to nurture innovative businesses to help them access new markets and create high-value jobs," said MP Butt.
